name: Binary Lands
description:
Welcome to the Binary Lands,

You are a virus knight who wants to corrupt this medieval-computer world.

On your faithful horse-bike you run to destroy all the firewalls of this system and nothing will stop you!

Can you beat our high-score?

This game was made by four students in their second year at e-artsup 

Pierre-Alexandre Bartel : Project Management, Game Design, Level Design, Programming, FX

Felix Bergeron : Programming, UX, Sound Design 

 Yuva Taleb : Character design, Props 3D, Animation 

https://yuvataleb.artstation.com/

Tim Bossart : Environment Art, Props 3D, UI

https://www.artstation.com/mazteba
